But yeah, the colour's messed up and there are pixels everywhere in several parts of the episodes, and I'm using VLC Player.  I'll try again, but if that doesn't work then...

is 10bit so you have to use a player that supports 10bit Properly or else you will see either a green screen or rainbow colors all over the video. Download K-lite Codecs or the Latest VLC or VLC Nighly
